article_title: Full text: Gov. Nikki Haley delivers State of the State
article_text: Let us start tonight, as we have rightfully done in the past, by honoring those heroes we lost over the last year. It is my sincere prayer that a year will come that there are no names for us to read.

article_summary:
Let us start tonight, as we have rightfully done in the past, by honoring those heroes we lost over the last year.
It is my sincere prayer that a year will come that there are no names for us to read.
